# Introduction

This document summarises the core helpers in `cdmAcm0006` for electricity and heat generation from biomass under ACM0006.

# Workflow

```{r}
library(cdmAcm0006)

sample_data <- simulate_acm0006_dataset(2, seed = 2024)

aggregate_monitoring_periods(sample_data)
estimate_emission_reductions_acm0006(sample_data)
```
